医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现人类疱疹病毒8诱发癌症的关键机制克利夫兰诊所的研究人员发现了卡波西肉瘤相关疱疹病毒 (KSHV)（也称为人类疱疹病毒 8 (HHV8)）诱发癌症的关键机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Scientists-discover-a-key-mechanism-used-by- human-herpesvirus-8-to-induce-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Scientists-discover-a-key-mechanism-used-by- human-herpesvirus-8-to-induce-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df7de39c-3ec9-4ba0-aca8-80e5590f2af6 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:47:32 -0500 Scientists discover a key mechanism used by human herpesvirus 8 to induce cancer
研究显示孕妇 omega-3 摄入量较低，尽管对健康有益一项新的全国队列研究的结果表明，尽管强烈建议食用 omega-3 脂肪酸以实现最佳妊娠结局和后代健康，但 25% 的参与者表示在怀孕期间很少或从不吃鱼，服用 omega-3 的人数较少补充品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-low-omega-3-intake-among-pregnant-women-despite-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-low-omega-3-intake-among-pregnant-women-despite-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62b332f2-8e9c-4d56-8bf0-6e13789c0fa7 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:40:41 -0500 Study reveals low omega-3 intake among pregnant women despite health benefits
新发现的抗体针对流感病毒难以发现的区域美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员发现了针对流感病毒难以发现的区域的抗体，揭示了神经氨酸酶（NA）蛋白头相对未被探索的“黑暗面”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Newly-identified-antibodies-target-a-hard-to-spot-region-of-the-influenza-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Newly-identified-antibodies-target-a-hard-to-spot-region-of-the-influenza-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff1696a3-b568-437c-a59e-6e1713ceaa42 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:36:02 -0500 Newly identified antibodies target a hard-to-spot region of the influenza virus
BPA 暴露影响肠道微生物多样性和儿童肥胖风险一种称为双酚 A (BPA) 的合成化学品广泛用于生产耐用塑料产品，包括眼镜、水瓶和环氧树脂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/BPA-exposure-influences-gut-microbial-diversity-and-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/BPA-exposure-influences-gut-microbial-diversity-and-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af183beb-28cc-41f6-8d95-f8d9cd17ed0f Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:17:20 -0500 BPA exposure influences gut microbial diversity and childhood obesity risk
最新的 COVID-19 加强剂可将成人患中度或重度疾病的风险减半根据一项新的全国数据研究，从 2023 年 9 月到 2024 年 1 月（JN.1 变异占主导地位的时期），最新的 COVID-19 加强注射可将成年人患中度或重度 COVID 的风险降低一半以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Latest-COVID-19-booster-halfs-risk-of-moderate-or-severe-disease-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Latest-COVID-19-booster-halfs-risk-of-moderate-or-severe-disease-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c296fc5b-8545-49a9-abc8-df4fa9c3db22 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:10:30 -0500 Latest COVID-19 booster halves risk of moderate or severe disease in adults
创伤后癫痫与长期痴呆风险相关吗？痴呆风险与 PTE 之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Is-posttraumatic-epilepsy-linked-with-long-term-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Is-posttraumatic-epilepsy-linked-with-long-term-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd4c9640-97c6-4ade-8919-a4f5854ec411 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 08:14:00 -0500 Is posttraumatic epilepsy associated with long-term dementia risk?
饮食与结直肠癌风险之间的关联改变饮食与结直肠癌 (CRC) 风险之间关联的基因变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/The-association- Between-diet-and-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/The-association- Between-diet-and-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e8fecf9-37b4-4628-bfd2-bcd268b182bd Fri, 01 Mar 2024 07:41:00 -0500 The association between diet and colorectal cancer risk
研究揭示了身体对长期禁食的分子反应新的研究结果表明，在长时间禁食期间，身体的多个器官会发生显着的系统性变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-the-bodys-molecular-response-to-prolonged-fasting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-the-bodys-molecular-response-to-prolonged-fasting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efeb3f6c-a846-4b32-9559-9a2981153834 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 07:40:49 -0500 Study reveals the body's molecular response to prolonged fasting
维生素 D 对 COVID-19 具有保护作用吗？ COVID-19 发病前补充维生素 D 是否可以带来益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Does-vitamin-D-have-protective-role-against-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Does-vitamin-D-have-protective-role-against-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c90389e-fa3a-4f9b-ae0e-0aa8d1d8d1c2 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 06:44:00 -0500 Does vitamin D have protective role against COVID-19?
欧洲专家发布成人急性淋巴细胞白血病治疗建议成人急性淋巴细胞白血病的治疗极其复杂、耗时且对患者来说压力很大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/European-experts-publish-recommendations-for-treatment-of-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/European-experts-publish-recommendations-for-treatment-of-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8894216a-c861-4ca3-b500-4c3c956579df Fri, 01 Mar 2024 06:00:00 -0500 European experts publish recommendations for treatment of acute lymphoblastic leukemia in adults
